data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Utenos, Lithuania from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Utenos, Lithuania
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Utenos, Lithuania a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 70 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Utenos.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, the the state of Utenos will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Azerbaijani people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Utenos that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Utenos, Lithuania to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Utenos. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

location.name: Utenos
location.people_groups_list: Kazakh, Jew, Eastern Yiddish-speaking, Uzbek, Northern, Estonian, Tatar
